metadata.learning_outcome: Students will understand the concept of ecology and the role of rainforests in regulating the environment.

context.subject: Computer Science
context.title: Learning HTML
context.learning_objective: This topic explores various methods for individuals to evaluate their own time management skills through self-assessment tools and techniques.

question.question_text: What is the primary purpose of self-assessment tools in time management?

options.A: To improve productivity by identifying strengths and weaknesses.
options.B: To eliminate the need for planning.
options.C: To create a rigid schedule that cannot be changed.
options.D: To assess the time management skills of others.
options.E: To resolve the time management skills of others.

explanations.A: Correct! The primary purpose of self-assessment tools is to help individuals improve their productivity by identifying their strengths and weaknesses in time management.
explanations.B: Incorrect. Self-assessment tools are not meant to eliminate planning; rather, they enhance it by providing insights.
explanations.C: Incorrect. These tools encourage flexible and adaptable planning, not rigid schedules.
explanations.D: Incorrect. Self-assessment tools are designed for personal evaluation, not for assessing others.
explanations.E: Incorrect. Resolve tools are designed for personal evaluation, not for assessing others.
